message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $130 for the product. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $110. This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $115. What do you think?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $115 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my last offer of $110. If you're not willing to accept it, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.
